name: Fates and Feels [LD]
description:
game made in under 48 hours for LD40.

Form a team, and fight monsters in a generated world! Don't let your emotions get the best of you, though! Too many feels and your troops may gain negative effects, run away, or forget who they are! :O

Atk/Def effect HP. Inflict/Resist effect Feels

If you liked the game, please consider donating. :) College isn't cheap, and making games take time.
